verbose_text: Low levels of Bcl-2 and high levels of Bax expression were detected following AngII treat ment for 24 h. Furthermore, the ratio of Bcl-2 to Bax, which appears to determine cell fate (survival or death), was markedly reduced by AngII treatment.
evidence: AngII treat ment for 24 h. Furthermore, the ratio of Bcl-2 to Bax, which appears to determine cell fate (survival or death), was markedly reduced by AngII
